blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Peter: Excuse me? I lost a kid, Harry. Can I make an announcement?
Store Clerk: Of course.
Peter: (leans into the mic)
Peter:...
body:
Peter: Excuse me? I lost a kid, Harry. Can I make an announcement?
Store Clerk: Of course.
Peter: (leans into the mic)
Peter: Goodbye you little shit.

dialogue.name: Peter
dialogue.label: Peter:
dialogue.phrase: Excuse me? I lost a kid, Harry. Can I make an announcement?

title: —deux.
body:
“I show not your face, but your heart’s desire” - Mirror of Erised

The fog hung thinly over the black lake and the skies were dark and sombre. Silence swathed the land as dementors skirted around and loomed hauntingly over Hogwarts, leaving the land barren with joy. The winds were merciless and frosty, and it stung to breathe as if the slap he just took from the person he hated most already wasn’t enough. 

He despised the gloomy atmosphere surrounding the school, the absence of life and cheering was starting to get to him. “I just want to get away from everything, even if its for awhile.” 

The silence was broken when the bricks on the walls before him started shifting, moving in various patterns to uncover an enormous door. He entered the room only to be struck in awe, his wish had been answered. The room was well lit and cosy, with a small fireplace north of the room. The place was almost like a replica of the school’s library, only cosier, warmer and quieter. He loved reading and simply drowning himself in books—it always took his mind off of things. He scoffed, this would’ve been Granger’s haven, what a foolish little know-it-all.

Beside the cackling fireplace, stood an ancient, ornate mirror. It had clawed feet and a gold frame inscribed with the phrase “ Erised stra ehru oyt ube cafru oyt on wohsi”. It confused him, for he was certain that it had not been there before. 

“Draco…” something whispered. He turned around hastily, but saw no one. Silence filled the place and once again,

“Draco…” he knew that it had to be that odd thing by the fire place. Stealthily, he approached the mirror.

Reflected, was himself, with a particularly bushy-haired Gryffindor by his side. He shifted his eyes down only to see their hands interlocked. 

Something in him snapped, all the rage he bore, all the anger he had towards Hermione gushed out faster than magma. He raised his fist and aimed for the ridiculous reflection staring at him. This can’t be…


part 2 is out!

blog.name: scarshavestories
blog.title: Scars Have Stories
blog.description: Scars like the one on Harry Potter’s face ⚡️

summary: After Harry and Ginny get back together after the war, all of the Weasley brothers ambush him at the Burrow when he’s meant to...
body:
After Harry and Ginny get back together after the war, all of the Weasley brothers ambush him at the Burrow when he’s meant to just be seeing Ron, and give him a semi-threatening warning about hurting their sister (again).

When Ginny finds out about this, she’s obviously both fuming and incredulous. Not only is she an adult perfectly capable of making her own decisions, but she is also quite clearly the most proficient in defence out of them all. She’s more than aware that they’re all a tiny bit terrified of her Bat Bogey Hex and has used that fact to her advantage on multiple occasions. Harry privately thinks the warning was kind of a sweet way of proving how loved Ginny is by her family so he can’t quite understand the anger.

Rather than directly calling them out on their paternalistic, misogynistic ways, Ginny decides to have a little fun along the way. She persuades Harry, who knows the Weasleys would never actually hurt him, to join in with her plan to wind her brothers up as much as possible. Any time they are together around Ginny’s brothers from that point on, they make it their mission to slide as many innuendos as possible into the conversation.

How much cake do you want? Just give me a finger.

Mmmmm it’s so moist!

Ooh toad in the hole! I do love a good sausage.

It takes a surprising amount of time for the Weasley boys to realise they’re being played. The first couple of times, they hear the innuendo but assume that it was accidental, their innocent baby sister wouldn’t know that could be interpreted in a dirty way. But then it keeps happening. Harry talks about owing their sister favours, Ginny makes a comment about swallowing, it just keeps on happening! When they finally figure out that all of the innuendos are deliberate, they’re horrified. They can’t even beg them to stop with their parents sat around the table, their Dad blissfully unaware and their Mum likely to hit the roof if she finds out they threatened Harry.

As soon as they’ve apparated away from the Burrow that evening, Harry and Ginny burst into hysterical fits of laughter, occasionally stopping long enough to remind each other of another hilarious reaction to one of their double-entrendres. Harry feels a twinge of guilt at having been mean to the Weasleys, but it’s quickly washed away by the sight of Ginny laughing more freely than he can ever remember. It was more than worth creeping out a few friends to see her looking like that, breathtakingly beautiful, her eyes alight with happiness for the first time in a long while.

summary:
Sirius Black: I never brag.
Remus Lupin: You once called your face “proof of God’s existence.”

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: I’m laughing a little bc of the Nagini thing, like frjekg I can’t understand why JKR wanted to be more “””dramatic”””, but ok we...
body:
I’m laughing a little bc of the Nagini thing, like frjekg

I can’t understand why JKR wanted to be more “””dramatic”””, but ok we will act like it’s cannon and not insane (I smell I’ll don’t like FB2). SO Nagini was a human who had the capacity of changing herself into a snake by her own will, but at a moment, she was stuck into this form. She went somewhere and met Voldemort, the only person able to speak to her in a snake form, and he became her world (+ she maybe thinks about Credence, sees a little of him into Tom idk).

Yeah this is tragic. She was surely on the good side in The Fantastic Beasts, and she’s evil in HP. 

But when I saw people who are like “boohoohoo think about that poor woman changed into a snake and killed by Neville, who is the purest boy” like wtf, SHE KILLED PEOPLE. She was at the side of the Dark Lord, who did not one war, but two, and killed himself a ton of wizards. She isn’t innocent, it’s not like she killed people by accident. Her death was necessery, she was an horcruxe and a killer damn.

And on the other side, I have to say you’re right. Because Neville and Harry would help her if they knew. + Harry was an horcruxe too and came back to life, and maybe, dying and being alive again could give back Nagini human’s form, maybe. And you can’t say no, they would not, because we have that fucking other snake named Severus. Harry was sorry about him when he killed a ton of people too, alongside Voldemort, and the only reason he wanted to go on the good side again was bc his boss killed the woman he loved, for me it’s selfish af, but WELL. WE ARE HERE TO TALK ABOUT NAGINI. So yeah if Harry was able to give his own son the name of a dark wizard (he is not grey, all his actions were only” for Lily”, revenge, not for the good), he was able to help a little a snake, he was able to talk to her, and maybe she would be a traitor of Voldemort at the end. But JKR prefered giving us Severus as a “””””grey””””” character. 

Oh and don’t give to me the excuse that JKR knew Nagini was a woman before, because no. If yes, she would put it in the story, by whatever, even a little shitty talking between Voldy and her like “You are more beautiful now than before”, and then we would be like “OMG THAT WAS ABOUT THAT!!!!!” but nop. :))))

Owner of the Fujin/Pro Shipper Support Group Discord. Any supporters welcome! DM for invite.

summary: Everyone up in arms about Nagini being cursed into a snake & "forced" to play pet to Voldemort, are we going to forget that...
question: Everyone up in arms about Nagini being cursed into a snake & "forced" to play pet to Voldemort, are we going to forget that Nagini was an evil force to be reckoned with in the books? Any time we saw her, she was being doted on by Voldemort, or devouring an innocent Muggle Studies professor, or, worse, killing a woman & possessing her rotting corpse to trick & try to kill Harry. Now that we suddenly have a backstory on her, suddenly we're racist for remembering what she was like in the books? Nah
answer: Like I get you, Nagini was definitely not a weak waif, she did some crazy shit in the books (the shapeshifting scene still absolutely terrifies me), and she felt like an actual threat as opposed to a smol danger noodle, but I just feel like JK keeps adding more and more outlandish takes to her own work that aren’t super thought out in a bid to be more “woke” and it just doesn’t work. I get it, there weren’t any openly queer people in HP, or that many POC, it was a different time, you want to be more diverse now (even if it’s for self-serving reasons), but honestly the “actually they were members of a marginalised identity the WHOLE TIME” galaxy brain shit doesn’t really feel like real representation because nobody knows, yk? We don’t need the characters doing things and then screaming “alSO I AM VERY GAY”, but literally who would’ve known Dumbledore was gay without her telling us? Just a casual drop in, that’s all. Your snake is an Asian woman? I’m? Your snake is a snake, Joanne. That’s what people are going to see on the surface level.

Your snake is an Asian woman? I’m? Your snake is a snake, Joanne. That’s what people are going to see on the surface level.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: a-potter-head
blog.title: Mischief Managed
blog.description: Jordan, 22, UK. Ravenclaw, Thunderbird, Jacob's brother.

tags: fantastic beasts the crimes of grindelwald
summary: People love to make out like she's making this up, like she's claiming to have had Nagini's ENTIRE backstory written down since...
body:
People love to make out like she’s making this up, like she’s claiming to have had Nagini’s ENTIRE backstory written down since COS was published.

Literally all this has to mean is that she knew Nagini used to be a human. That’s all. Is that possible? Of course it is!

Have any of you people ever actually written a book? Have you ever been planning an important character, had a stroke of inspiration, a big idea for their background, thought “now, that’s interesting” and kept it in mind when writing? Have you ever had the pleasure of knowing something big about your character that no one else does? Give it a try, it’s fucking amazing.

For God’s sake, Nagini’s name essentially meant “half-snake, half-woman” the entire time. Big hint. I didn’t know this until after the trailer came out, but that’s my fault, not Rowling’s. People love to make fun of the naming of Wolfy McWolf and Dog Black the black dog, and yet we didn’t notice this? Just goes to show, it’s easy when you know the answer.

But yeah, why not tell us until now?

Well, for a start, was it actually relevant before? By the time Harry meets Nagini, she’s gone full-snake. Like many other characters’ backstories, hers just never comes up because it doesn’t serve the plot. In the books, Harry’s quest is to hunt the Horcruxes, Nagini included. And all his information comes from Dumbledore. If Dumbledore knows where Nagini came from, why would he even tell Harry? To complicate the plot and give Harry some bullshit internal struggle about killing a woman/not-even-a-woman-anymore before she is inevitably killed anyway? To make Neville look like the bad guy? Or are we meant to drag out the plot of the Deathly Hallows by adding in a quest to try to “save” Nagini on top of the million other things going on in this book?

Whatever. Thing is, there were plenty of things in the books that wanted to be explored further, and I wouldn’t be surprised if Rowling had decided to save this for the same possible prequel that could explore the Grindelwald drama among many other things. God knows people begged her to keep writing.

But who knew secrets have an expiry date before people start saying “Sure Jan”? Oh wait, we all did, when whiny bitches decided that Rowling didn’t even think up the Horcruxes until halfway through the series, or that Dumbledore being gay was a retcon despite him never coming across as a Straight Man. This stuff isn’t that hard to come up with, guys. It’s called imagination. “Snake used to be woman” is from the same person who brought us Scabbers. Or do you think she just lacks the self-control to keep such a secret for 20 years?

For the record, apart from Nagini’s name (seriously, yikes) the books always made it clear that she is NOT an ordinary snake. (They also made it clear that she’s more than just a “pet” to Voldemort, so let’s not even Go There.) I always figured she was just a Magic Snek and I waited to find out more on Pottermore, but whatever, don’t get annoyed just because you never noticed. Do get annoyed if you were fooled by that theory about Nagini that Rowling has shut down - you know the one I mean.

Tl;dr “Nagini used to be human” is not that big of a reach. Read the books. Dial the cynicism back a notch. Have a nice day.

blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
THE WORLD ON FIRE

 while the order of the phoenix fights the onward march of the death eaters with stealth, espionage, and a...
caption:
THE WORLD ON FIRE

while the order of the phoenix fights the onward march of the death eaters with stealth, espionage, and a well-placed auror or two, across wizarding britain other groups combat blood purism with methods cruel or crude, depending on who you ask. to these vigilantes, a dark mark isn’t what makes a man guilty - being a blood purist is crime enough. citizens are collateral, and anyone is fair game.

this and more on halys, a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in mid-1980 at the height of the first wizarding war.

we are currently seeking members of two anti-purist groups: non-magicals and the “gobstones league.”

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: ANTI-PURIST TERRORISM
